body_html: @yuanbyu While I was creating the reproducing example I realised, that we have made different kind of error in our code. We just mistakenly thought that this was a problem. My simple example uses the mechanism described above and works just fine, so there is actually no issue to be solved. Sorry for that and thanks for your help.
